data.name: EcoRide X1
data.desc: Introducing the EcoRide X1, a top-of-the-line E-bike with a high-efficiency motor and sleek design. Ideal for commuting and leisure rides.

data.name: GreenBike Pro
data.desc: The GreenBike Pro offers a durable build and advanced features for both urban and off-road adventures. Perfect for all types of riders.

data.name: CityGlide E-Bike
data.desc: Experience the CityGlide E-bike, designed for urban commuting with a focus on comfort and efficiency. Features a lightweight frame and smooth ride.

data.name: VoltRide Turbo
data.desc: The VoltRide Turbo combines speed and style with a powerful motor and high-capacity battery. Perfect for those who crave performance.

data.name: PowerGlide Z2
data.desc: PowerGlide Z2 offers an exceptional blend of technology and design, featuring a robust frame and advanced electronics for a smooth ride.

data.name: UrbanSwift E
data.desc: UrbanSwift E provides a compact design with excellent maneuverability and efficiency, ideal for city commuting and short trips.
